Room.Name: Main Courtyard West
Room.ShortDescription: You are on the west side of the main courtyard in Prince Ragnar's castle.
Room.LongDescription: The broad stone floor is scrubbed clean by a cleaning crew, but there seems to be a heavy stain of blood next to a hallway which disappears into the depths of the castle. Standing near the entry to the hall is a pushcart and a wizened old woman. She sells potions and oils, and mutters under her breath as she gazes around the huge courtyard.
